title: Lamar Odom found unresponsive, hospitalized
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Lamar Odom found unresponsive, hospitalized Former NBA star Lamar Odom has been hospitalized after he was found unresponsive inside a Nevada brothel, the Associated Press reports. Former NBA star Lamar Odom has been hospitalized after he was found unresponsive inside a Nevada brothel, the Associated Press reports. 
The news was first reported by TMZ , which suggests that Odom had taken an herbal alternative to Viagra prior to being found unconscious. BREAKING: Sheriff says former NBA star Lamar Odom found unresponsive at Nevada brothel, hospitalized. â€” The Associated Press (@AP) October 14, 2015 Read or Share this story: http://fcnews.tv/1RGnLXv TOP VIDEOS
